aws_neptune_event_subscription.description: Provides a Neptune event subscription resource.

enabled.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable the subscription. Defaults to true.

event_categories.description: A list of event categories for a `source_type` that you want to subscribe to. Run `aws neptune describe-event-categories` to find all the event categories.

name.description: The name of the Neptune event subscription. By default generated by Terraform.

name_prefix.description: The name of the Neptune event subscription. Conflicts with `name`.

sns_topic_arn.description: The ARN of the SNS topic to send events to.

source_ids.description: A list of identifiers of the event sources for which events will be returned. If not specified, then all sources are included in the response. If specified, a `source_type` must also be specified.

source_type.description: The type of source that will be generating the events. Valid options are `db-instance`, `db-security-group`, `db-parameter-group`, `db-snapshot`, `db-cluster` or `db-cluster-snapshot`. If not set, all sources will be subscribed to.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
